message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $10000 by both myself and you. Considering its high quality and the value it brings, I propose a special introductory price of $9500 for this exceptional opportunity. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an excellent chance to secure such a valuable asset at a discounted rate. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.
